title: Yokubou Kansen
sinopse:
I'll get infected. These Desires are getting into my body...

Makoto Takamori, homeroom teacher of the special class, is being captivated by Hozumi Souma since half a year ago. "You won't bore me" he says while coming closer...
In the end, when their pupils have met, desire enters her body like a contageous disease. Thus, she can't run away...
